sentences.sContent: Buying a new butane soldering torch was a challenge.
sentences.sContent_eng: Buying a new butane soldering torch was a challenge.
sentences.sCn: 购买一台新丁烷焊炬是一个挑战。

sentences.sContent: Propane and butane can be stored and transported as a mixture or separately.
sentences.sContent_eng: Propane and butane can be stored and transported as a mixture or separately.
sentences.sCn: 丙烷与丁烷可作为混合物储存和运输，也可分开储存运输。

sentences.sContent: Liquefied petroleum gases, such as propane and butane, have not been included As they are too numerous to mention.
sentences.sContent_eng: Liquefied petroleum gases, such as propane and butane, have not been included As they are too numerous to mention.
sentences.sCn: 由于它们数量众多，无法一一提及，液化石油气体，如丙烷和丁烷没有包括在这里。

trans.tranOther: a gas stored in liquid form, used for cooking and heating
